mode.docs:
**, string**: The operation mode. One of these values:
  * `snapshot`
  
  * `stream`
  
  

*See also: [ESP32 Camera Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/esp32_camera_web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

port.docs:
**, string**: The serving port.

*See also: [ESP32 Camera Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/esp32_camera_web_server.html#configuration-variables)*
